name: Feel The Snow
description: Choose one of the characters and start your journey. The game has many interesting things in store: building, crafting, puzzles, bosses, mystery, laughs, quests etc.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Windows 7 / Windows 8.1 / Windows 10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: 512 mb video memory DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 512 MB available space Additional Notes: Runs fine on integrated graphics cards.
